headline: $1.2 Bn Dry Transformer Insulation Market - Global Forecast to 2030 | Core Insulation to Hold Significant Share, Coatings Segment Emerges as Key Growth Driver
summary: The dry transformer insulation market is expected to grow from USD 0.93 billion in 2025 to USD 1.21 billion by 2030, demonstrating a CAGR of 5.5%. Key drivers include increased demand for reliable electrical distribution in commercial and residential sectors, urbanization, and infrastructure expansion. Dry transformer insulation solutions are preferred for their low maintenance and eco-friendly attributes, aligning with global energy efficiency and sustainability goals. The Asia Pacific leads th

headline: Soybean Oil Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring ADM, Wilmar International, AAK, Bunge Global, Cargill, DuPont, Unilever, and Associated British Foods
summary: The global soybean oil market is set to surge, reaching US$ 229.06 billion by 2033 from US$ 89.91 billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 10.95% from 2025 to 2033. Key factors driving growth include rising demand for plant-based oils, increasing health awareness, and its uses in food, industrial applications, and biodiesel production. High omega-3 and omega-6 content make soybean oil a healthier choice, boosting its popularity. However, competition from other oils and price volatility present challenges

content.title: Soybean Oil Market Forecast and Company Analysis Report 2025-2033 Featuring ADM, Wilmar International, AAK, Bunge Global, Cargill, DuPont, Unilever, and Associated British Foods
content.summary: The global soybean oil market is set to surge, reaching US$ 229.06 billion by 2033 from US$ 89.91 billion in 2024, with a CAGR of 10.95% from 2025 to 2033. Key factors driving growth include rising demand for plant-based oils, increasing health awareness, and its uses in food, industrial applications, and biodiesel production. High omega-3 and omega-6 content make soybean oil a healthier choice, boosting its popularity. However, competition from other oils and price volatility present challenges
